title: Wink or Blink?

intro.p1: Machines can’t tell the difference between a wink and a blink. AI systems can track an eye opening and closing, but they cannot understand the action in context or know what it means.
intro.p2: Can you tell if someone is winking or blinking from what is going on around them?
intro.p3: This game draws on the work of anthropologist Clifford Geertz and his theory of “thick description.” To discover more resources on the social science of emotion click

defWink: to open and close the eye quickly as a hint or signal
defBlink: to open and close the eye involuntarily

prizePage.title: Congratulations!
prizePage.p: You can read facial expressions in context, something that emotion recognition systems cannot do. You are part of the emojification resistance!
